classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Introduction
============

This addon register timeago_ jquery plugin into Plone resource registry
and activate it on '.timeago' selector with l10n.

About TimeAgo
=============

Timeago is a jQuery plugin that makes it easy to support automatically updating
fuzzy timestamps (e.g. "4 minutes ago" or "about 1 day ago")

Timeago has locale/i18n/language support.

Changelog
=========

----------------

----------------

- Initial release

Introduction

This addon register timeago jquery plugin into Plone resource registry and activate it on ‘.timeago’ selector with l10n.

About TimeAgo

Timeago is a jQuery plugin that makes it easy to support automatically updating fuzzy timestamps (e.g. “4 minutes ago” or “about 1 day ago”)

Timeago has locale/i18n/language support.
